summary: Catch as much ice cream as you can and serve them to your enthusiastic customers!

name: Nu, pogodi! Vypusk 4: Dogonyalki
summary: A fun children's arcade invites you to take part in the adventures of the famous couple of mischievous people - the Wolf and the Hare. Players are waiting for eight exciting levels, each of which consists of several funny episodes. Several difficulty levels suitable for both beginners and experienced Hares. Passing the game, the guys will learn an exciting story with an unexpected ending.

name: Numberful
summary: A puzzle game from Midnight Tea Studio.

name: Nuclear Throne Together: Hard Mode
summary: Big mod for Nuclear Throne Together.

name: Numeral Lord
summary: minimalism strategy game

name: Num-Sama
summary: Num-Sama is third person melee combat game that can be played with Numpad keys.Promising to players a unique gaming experience.How you use your blade is important.

name: Nuremberg: VRdict of Nations
summary: A VR investigation of the crimes against humanity committed by the Nazi leaders.

name: Nuclear Winter
summary: After years of living underground in the safe zone you return to what is left of a once-thriving city after a nuclear war. Learn to avoid the radiation, scavenge for resources, craft tools and build shelter in this first person dystopia simulator.

name: Nuclear Rush
summary: Nuclear Rush is an unreleased Sega Mega Drive tank combat game for use with the Sega VR headset, developed by FutureScape Productions and slated to be published by Sega. Intended to be the hardware’s pack-in game, it features gameplay similar to Battlezone and Stellar-Fire.

name: NullCat
summary: Help nullcat escape the puzzling nullworld!

name: Number Guesser
summary:
"Number Guesser" is a game based on "Bulls and Cows", and I don't have much content to say, just give you a funny one!!
You can play Bulls and Cows with 3, 4, or 5 digit numbers, and see how wonderful the answer is!!

name: Null & Peta -Invasion of the Queen Bug-
summary: The crazy comedy anime Null & Peta has been reborn as a thumb-threatening action adventure! Featuring sisterly cooperation, gorgeous event CGs—and plenty of secrets to explore!?

name: Nuclear Bunker
summary: Sprawling techbase exploration focused dungeon crawl with mostly low intensity combat (though there are a few set piece battles). This map was finished in 2007, but I hadn't released it because it was supposed to be part of a mini-episode that was never finished.

name: NumberMaze
summary: NumberMaze is an educational game where players get to practice their math skills. The game consists of a number of mazes that the player has to navigate his way through to get to a castle. Viewed from a top down perspective the player moves his character by clicking with the mouse. The mazes have many doorways that the player has to go through. To pass through these the player has to solve math problems. There are also doors that are locked and for these the player first have to locate a key to open. Scattered through the mazes are also books which the player has to collect before he gets access to the castle.

name: Nululu Online
summary: Nululu Online was a Thai fantasy MMORPG for PC and Symbian mobile devices.

name: Nurtopu: Fetö ile Mücadele
summary: For a long time, Fetö has been a problem for İsmail, the art teacher. Ismail seeks revenge, but unlike Wolverine, he does not want to get his hands dirty. Therefore, he reads the Risale-i Nur and prays at home. Nurtopu, İsmail's female rabbit, decides to do something about this and goes on a great adventure. At this point, you, the player, must control Nurtopu to put an end to Fetö and avenge İsmail.

name: Nudomatic
summary: Nudomatic is a game in which you go around Megacity to photograph and undress the pretty girls who cross your path.

name: Nuklear Klone
summary: A Nuclear Throne demake for the PICO-8. You play as Suzie and Bob who are trapped in a merciless world and have to fight your way out!

name: Nucleus
summary: Kuju's cellular shooter offers something a little different than the typical dual-joystick shooter.

name: Number
summary: It's a number calculation game. It doesn't seem to be difficult. But when you play it, it tests your brain's flexibility very much. Especially for the flexibility of number calculation, do you want to try it? How many levels can you play with the simple mathematical formula?

name: Nuclear Wipeout
summary: Classic Wipeout but with bigger destructive stakes. Play 31 challenging 3D platforming levels where you are testing the new kind of Nuclear weapons. This game is a short school project of Ahlman Institute students.

name: Nun&Gun
summary: Enter a world of darkness and chaos where the fate of humanity rests on the shoulders of a mysterious nun. Our 2.5D run-and-gun shooter features intense action, epic boss battles, responsive controls, and stunning 3D graphics

name: NudGirls
summary: NudGirls is a big collection of riddles and puzzles. You are going to explore various worlds and meet incredibly beautiful girls. Pass the test using your intelligence. Undressed charming bodies and no clothes on. Would you like to receive your reward?

name: Number Magic
summary:
Number Magic is an educational game designed to teach young children arithmetic. It is based around a stage magic theme, and includes many images of rabbits and top hats. 
 
Three modes are available. Quick Quiz displays randomly-generated arithmetic questions and the player is scored by correct answers. Comp Quiz allows the user to customize several quiz options, such as enable time limits, choose whether to complete answers or missing numbers, and select custom or randomly-generated questions. Electroflash is similar to Comp Quiz but all of the questions include a specific number and arithmetic operation, chosen by the user. 
 
After each quiz, the player can choose to repeat the same quiz, generate a new quiz with the same options, select a new quiz type, or quit.

name: Nuclear Throne Ultra
summary: This is a mod for Vlambeer's game Nuclear Throne that adds new characters, new areas, 100s of new weapons (which you can now upgrade), and new game modes.

name: Nucleite
summary: Awoken at night you listen to the screams of radiation victims and gangs rioting the streets for anything to survive, you have 2 options; escape or find the truth. Both are seemingly impossible and it us up to you to find out, alone or with friends.

name: Nullmaze
summary: Welcome to the infinite world that you can change with the only superpower - you available to buy items from which this world will be generated!

name: Nushi Tsuri 64
summary: Fishing

name: Numb
summary: Numb will get to you in position to experience some of the sleep phases, through James, a normal person with some stress problem which effect his sleep. Are you ready to live, or die, in a dream? Is it actually a dream, though?

name: Nutjitsu
summary: Trace a safe route to help a ninja squirrel pick up power-ups and avoid enemies in a modern Pac-Man.

name: Numan Athletics
summary: Numan Athletics is sports game - or more more precisely a bunch of several futuristic sports minigames. The player controls 'numan' - a superhuman. Four numans (numen?) compete in eight bizarre competitions, such as throwing a rocket, running (faster than a dragster), and shooting targets (with fireballs or missiles). The game supports multi-player for up to four players.

name: Nuclear Reaction
summary: One-Button Local-Multiplayer

name: Nusantara: Legend of The Winged Ones
summary: An otome visual novel, combined with Indonesian culture, about a girl who falls into a world full of mystery and men!

name: Nude in the Castle
summary: Nude In The Castle is a third person game where you play as a sexy girl who is trying to save her castle from perverts. Armed with a sharp ax, cut and kill the dirty perverts who have captured this castle.

name: Numentale
summary: Procedurally generated rogue-lite, card-crawling RPG tale with focus on player choice and strategy

name: Numismatist
summary:
Now you can start to collect coins on your android. 
 
The main features. 
- The real coins and real series. 
- Exchange, trade and auction. The most interesting thing in collecting - it's getting coins. 
- The study of history. In our game we added description of each coin, telling us about her plot.

name: Null
summary:
Null is a fast-paced sci-fi Arena FPS inspired by the all-time classic "Quake III Arena"!
In this game you play as a robot fighting against other players in online Free-For-All matches.

name: Nurose
summary: Build your own custom spells in Nurose. Challenge others to online duels where you will fight using your own custom made spells. You can create shields, mines, clones, movement abilities, and much more.

name: Nushi Tsuri 64: Shiokaze ni Notte
summary: Fishing

name: Null Reference Exception
summary: Become a future AI and delve into 3D bullet hell action in an advanced lab. Combine various modules, repeat combat training, enhance stats with research points, and earn achievements to develop your unique combat style. Enjoy overcoming waves of enemies and defeating bosses within time limits.

name: Nucleares
summary: Nuclear Reactor Simulator, operable by a single person with the help of an AI Assistant.

name: Number Sums
summary: Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental arithmetic. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row and column be equal to the clues on the side of the board.

name: Nurse Sofi
summary: Nurse Sofi is a game from Pen in Apple studio, developed for the PC platform. The project combines genres and elements such as rpg and logic. Additionally, players highlight such game features as indie, casual, simulator and adventure. The game is designed for single player, multiplayer modes are not provided.

name: Nuke the Dinosaurs Blueprint Prototype
summary:
Nuke the Dinosaurs Blueprint Prototype is a pinball game created during the Mojam 2.

It was a surprise title worked on by Junkboy, Aron, Jon, and Steven (from Surasshu Sound), but they’ve decided to release the blueprint prototype early.

name: Nuclear Titbit 2
summary: Russian adventure point & click game. The second game released by Buka Entertainment under the brand name "Byaka" ("Бяка"), specially created for this kind of games. The idea and scenario of the game belong to Daniil Shepovalov.

name: Nuts
summary: Nuts is a single-level PWAD for Doom II meant for limit removing source ports. It was designed by Bernard De Windt (B.P.R.D) and uses as its music track a MIDI sequence of "Kashmir" by Led Zeppelin. Nuts is a massive slaughter map featuring a deliberately outrageous number of enemies, known for slowing down even the most powerful of computers to a crawl upon release. It was created to test the /idgames archive upload function for the author's contemporary work, Equinox, and is now remembered as a quintessential joke WAD. Two years later, it received two sequels, Nuts 2 and Nuts 3.

name: NullStar
summary: Can you complete this finite runner? Test your arcade skills with NullStar. Death resets your progress, but unlocked power-ups are retained. The more you play and the farther you get, the better chance you have of getting to the end!

name: Null Battles
summary: A shooter for Xbox Live. It is a 3D game.

name: Nurikabe World
summary: Nurikabe World is a relaxing logic puzzle game where you solve puzzles by creating islands and connecting rivers to create beautiful sceneries. Experience different landscapes and seasons, solve puzzle campaigns and create your own levels.

name: Nuclear Winter
summary: Nuclear Winter is a single player mission for Half-Life Opposing Force. It comprises 29 new maps plus a ton of new scripted scenes, models, artwork, character voices, sound effects and music.

name: N++: Ultimate Edition
summary:
"N++ is a fast-paced, momentum-based platformer where you get to play as a badass parkour-loving ninja, narrowly escaping enemies and collecting gold in sci-fi landscapes.

What's new in the Ultimate Edition? So much. 60 dynamic new colour schemes, new ninja headbands, new secrets and more. The Ultimate Edition doubles the size of N++, bringing the total to 4340 hand-crafted, finely tuned levels in 3 game modes: Solo, Co-op and Race. It also adds a new mode, Hardcore, which changes the rules of the game and lets you see Solo in a whole new light. Hardcore mode is a true challenge for Ultimate ninjas! And it's completely free -- this update means the game could last a lifetime. N++ is truly the last platformer you'll ever need to buy!"

name: Nuvavult
summary: A perspective altering puzzle game where 2D and 3D collide.

name: Nuclear Titbit
summary: Russian point & click game. The first game released by Buka under the "Byaka" ("Бяка") brand, specially created for this kind of games. The idea and scenario of the game belong to Daniil Shepovalov.

name: Nuclear 2050
summary: A man on the way to work heard the Nuclear Alert that day, the whole environment started to panic, people were screaming away but he wanted to avoid the worst, he had little time because his family was in danger he had to stop the disaster.

name: Nuclear Union
summary: Nuclear Union was an upcoming postapocalyptic nuclear-strike video game developed by Best Way, and published by 1C Company, to be released in 2014 Q2 exclusively for Microsoft Windows. The story begins during the Cuban Missile Crisis of 1962, with the majority of the narrative and gameplay taking place in an alternate, modern-day Soviet Union.

name: Nuclear Frost
summary: Nuclear Frost is an action-adventure first-person shooter where you have to face the threats that the new world has brought to bear. Fight mutants, keep yourself warm, avoid radiation and fight fungus to save your home.

name: Nurtopu
summary: It is a rabbit game for collecting 2d diamonds. 2d hyper casual platform game.

name: Nudo
summary: Nudo is a minimalist platformer on top of a rubik’s cube.

name: N.U.T.Z.
summary:
N.U.T.Z. is a non-linear platform game that incorporates elements of a shooting platformer, and is inspired by classics such as Megaman and Metroid.
Take control of a unique character and attack and aim in a 360 degree radius. Use your individually unique abilities on your character to roam the levels and discover powerful upgrades and interesting secrets to fight the Saurian Invasion. You are the planet's last hope.

name: Nun Attack Origins: Yuki
summary:
An ancient portal has opened, releasing a force that razed the village and spirited the orphans away. It’s up to Yuki, Sister of Silence, mistress of stealth and Nun-jutsu, to eradicate this unrelenting evil. In this epic quest to save the missing orphans and avenge the village, peek into Yuki’s past as she uses her deadly ninja war fans to kick some serious butt. 
 
In a world where the wicked know no rest, you must hunt down the forces of evil and save the kidnapped orphans before God knows what horrible fate befalls them! 
 
In this tactical action-puzzle, discover Yuki’s secret art of Nun-jutsu: slide, slice and dice! Through an intuitive touch-screen gameplay, strike at enemies from the shadows, slay - Deep Ones, and rebuild the village, all on your quest to save the missing orphans.

name: Nuke It
summary: Unofficial add-on for Duke Nukem 3D. Contains 300 user levels for Duke Nukem 3D downloaded from the internet.

name: Number 99
summary: Number 99 is a futuristic Rogue Racing Game throughout the galaxy. 50% driving and 50% fight on the track. Upgrading your ship is vital for the victory and don’t be afraid to talk dirty to the opponents, or even hack their ships to ensure your 1rst place in the end.

name: Number 94
summary: A short experimental horror game about infra-red and the dangers beyond our perceived color spectrum.

name: Number 7
summary: Number 7 reimagines the classic Lines game, infusing it with modern features.

name: Number One Kill Extra
summary: #1 Kill Extra is a single-level PWAD for Doom that was designed by Angelo Jefferson and released in 1997. It was released at the same time as #1Kill and was followed by Number One Kill The Next Generation later in the same year.

name: Numantia
summary:
Units, heroes and battles inspired in real events.
Deep narrative linked to the historical evolution of the conflict.
Two different campaigns with their own heroes, troops, settlements and armies.
Play solo or with a friend in a local 1v1 mode.

name: Nuclear Playground
summary: Nuclear Playground is a survival-horror game set in Chernobyl. Clean up radioactive items while evading mutated horrors. Manage resources and survive the deadly environment. Theme: environmental disaster.

name: Numbers Planet: Games and Puzzles
summary:
This is a collection of more than 25 simple and amusing games about numbers and math. 
 
 
It includes the following games: 
---------------------- 
Math Addition +, Math Multiplication x , Math Division ÷ and Math Subtraction -: Connect 3 or more numbers so that their result is equal to one of the targets. 
 
Connect Numbers, Connect Numbers 2048 Style: Match 3 games where you connect 3 or more same numbers. 
 
Columns 2048 Style, Columns Addition Style, Columns Erase Style: Match 3 games where you direct the falling columns to make 3 or more same numbers adjacent to each other. 
 
1 + 2 = 3, Arithmetic Challenge: Math addition, subtraction, division and multiplication game. Touch the correct answer. 
 
Duel 1 + 2 = 3, Arithmetic Duel: Math games where 2 persons are competing on the same device. The score will be counted for the person who touches the correct answer first. 
 
Matching Cards Easy Level, Matching Cards Medium Level, Matching Cards Difficult Level: Math matching memory games. 
 
Draw Numbers: Match 3 game where you draw the top numbers on the empty bottom blocks, making 3 or more same numbers adjacent to each other. 
 
Merge Numbers: Same game where you touch the group of the same numbers. 
 
Numbers Battle: destroy all numbers by shooting the correct bullets on each number. 
 
Numbers Clock: Shoot numbers on the clock so that their positions are ordered in ascending order. 
 
Touch Numbers in Order: touch the numbers in ascending order from 1 to 30 as quickly as possible. 
 
Sliding Numbers: Sliding puzzle game to arrange the cards in ascending order. 
 
Who jumps? 1 or 2: Touch the right or left half of the screen so that number 1 or 2 can jump without colliding. 
 
Falling Blocks: direct falling blocks to complete rows with no spaces. 
 
Chess Knight: direct the knight to touch all the squares of the chess board with the least number of movements. 
 
Color Arrow: touch screen when the color of the arrow is the same as the color of the opposite side of the circle. 
 
Classic Snake: Direct the snake to eat the apple. 
---------------------------- 
 
 
More games will be added in the near future. 
 
If you are left-handed: you can change the position of the buttons to the left of the screen from the settings page. 
 
When it’s game over, you can continue playing and keep your score after watching a short video ad till its end. If you did not watch the video completely, the game would end. 
 
Feel free to tell us your feedback, ideas, suggestions, requests, bugs and rate our game. 
 
It has been designed for both tablets and smartphones. 
 
The game supports the following languages: 
-	English 
-	Arabic 
-	French 
-	Spanish 
-	German 
-	Japanese 
-	Chinese 
-	Urdu 
-	Hindi 
-	Italian 
-	Portuguese 
-	Turkish 
-	Russian 
-	Korean 
 
If the language is not shown correctly, you have to install it on your device from Settings icon, then Language & input. 
 
Play, enjoy and have fun !

name: Nurse Love Obsession
summary:
Bundle including
- Nurse Love Addiction
- Nurse Love Syndrome
- Both titles OST

name: NutShot
summary: NutShot is a hilarious, stylized, fast-paced, movement-based, high-stakes, FPS arena shooter that's all about moving fast. Speed through arenas by jumping, diving, sliding, grappling, and more. Let the best peanut win!

name: Nutty Fluffies
summary: A mobile game based on racing across rollercoasters.

name: Nude Crisis
summary: Nude Crisis is a Stealth Puzzle game. Hina is an office worker who finds her clothes missing after showering at work. Now she must make it home safely without being seen.

name: Nude and Afraid: 11 Day Challenge
summary: Take part in a 11 day dating survival challenge with four different partners in various biomes. You'll hunt, craft, forage, and defend your camp, as you romance your partner and build a relationship that goes beyond the challenge.

name: Nun Attack Origins: Yuki's Silent Quest
summary: Nun Attack Origins: Yuki's Silent Quest is an tactical action game from Frima Studio.

name: Nurse Enjoy Gyaru Pack
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
- Boku to Nurse no Kenshuu Nisshi
- Boku to Joi no Shinsatsu Nisshi

name: Number Fields
summary: Number Fields is a logic game where players uncover tiles indicating the proximity of hidden bombs and treasures. Choose your difficulty, customize grid sizes, and enjoy. Provides a way to stay fully engaged while calming nervous energy discreetly.

name: Null Moon
summary: Duke is enjoying his holiday. He visits the secluded town of Whitehorne in snowbound Ontario - and just like that, his holiday is suddenly filled with work.

name: Nulandia
summary: A dynamic metaverse to explore, create, and compete. Build and trade virtual real estate, adopt pets, and design unique avatars. Engage in games like Robot Races and Sunset Surfing, utilize AI tools for art and more, and enjoy activities such as beach cinema. Earn Nu and real-life prizes.

name: NumTasu
summary:
In Japanese it is called 'Tasu' that the calculation adds up.
NumTasu is a puzzle game multiplied by 'Number (num)' and 'Add(Tasu)'.
It is an application that selects the necessary one from the numbers arranged in a square and completes the addition in the vertical and horizontal directions.
Easy operation just to tap the number and select the game.

name: Nunna
summary: Nunna is a turn-based combat game with rogue-lite and deck-building elements. Defeat the enemies in front of Nunna and end her journey.

name: Number One Rich
summary: Number One Rich is an 8-player strategy game.Decide the number of steps you take by throwing dice. You can buy land and build buildings where you stay, and you must pay rent when passing other players' land. Bankrupt other players to get the first place.

name: NuPa
summary: Just like Picross, use the numbers as hints to complete the picture. Expresses a unique world-view through exquisite performances featuring movies of futuristic images and game narration by voice actors.

name: Nu//void
summary: Flick between the worlds of light and dark to discover the way to your escape. Avoid the phantom. Pronounced "nullvoid".

name: Number Battle
summary: Number Battle (Sujin Taisen: Number Battles) is a new kind of board game that combines puzzle and strategy. You take turns against human or computer opponents in an attempt to reach a target score by placing numbered tiles on the board.

name: Nun
summary: NUN is a third-person narrative and cinematic open-world adventure game, with action and RPG elements and a 1970s horror aesthetic. In 1820, Sister Mary-Martin, a Templar agent, is sent on a mission to the land of Winchester to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a young nun.

name: Nuclear Pizza War
summary: Nuclear Pizza war is a strategy game created during Mojam 2 by members of the Mojang team.

name: Nubarron: The adventure of an unlucky gnome
summary: Guide Gnome across the dangers of this twisted fairytale world. Can you break the curse that made that annoying cloud appear? Can you recover his stolen Lucky Hat? Can you trust your friends? Find out in Nubarron, a casual puzzle platformer set in a beautiful digitally painted world full of weird creatures you'll have to deal with.

name: Numen: Contest of Heroes
summary: Nine deities. Nine heroes. And only one champion. Mythical Greece. The land of gods, poets, heroes, but also of terrible monsters and creatures. Numen is a fully three-dimensional action RPG set in mythical Greece.

name: Numberball
summary:
Numberball is a 1-player educational math game for the Apple II.

The player tries to solve mathematical equations by shooting balls into an equation via a series of tubes and switches. An equation is shown on the bottom of the screen, and a ball with a number appears in a slot. The player can choose to shoot or discard the number. The player must align the tubes so the number arrives in the correct location to solve the equation.

name: Nushi Tsuri Adventure: Kite no Bouken
summary:
Nushi Tsuri Adventure: Kite no Bouken is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 2000.

The series is a cross between Harvest Moon and Final Fantasy / Dragon Quest. The first game finds the protagonist setting off on a quest to find a legendary fish, said to cure a life threatening illness his sister is suffering from. But like any quest, there will be plenty of obstacles in true RPG style.

name: Nuts!: Battle of the Bulge
summary: Nuts!: Battle of the Bulge is a Decision Games card game that recreates the famous World War Two battle (16-31 Dec 1944) in which the German Army mounted a surprise attack on the thin U.S. forces deployed in the Ardennes region.

name: Nump Jump
summary: Nump Jump is relaxing 2D platformer where your main goal is to avoid enemies and obstacles on the way. You should also collect as many coins as you can and reach final target 1000 meters.

name: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator 2
summary: Sunshine, cloudless sky, beautiful weather, nothing can spoil your day. But what is it? Why doesn't this gentleman have panties? Why does the old lady walk naked? Oh, no, it looks like you've come to the wrong beach...

name: Nummels
summary: Nummels are dumb but predictable little guys. They’ll always interact with what’s in front of them, even if it’s a chewed up piece of gum. So toss them a ladder, dig a path, place a bridge, or blast a wall. Get them home safely in this medium skill platformer. Use your brain, they won’t use theirs!

name: Nuigurumi no Cakeya-san: Mahou no Patissiere
summary: A 3DS game focused on baking.

name: Nukeheck
summary: kill demons, collaborate to build powerups, nuke heck

name: Nuclear Day
summary:
An exciting survival simulator in a post-apocalyptic world!
A fascinating survival in a post-apocalyptic world!
Amazing game with a unique atmosphere! Try to survive in a post-nuclear city.
Can you handle the post-nuclear world? Radiation, hunger, disease and suffering are everywhere. And your only goal is to escape from the dying city and find the love of youth. Unique Atmosphere and deep story. Solve the mystery of the lost documents and make choices: will you save everyone or will you leave them to die...

name: Nuclear Fighter
summary: Is a fun and fast 2D platformer with a side view. Your goal is to escape from the city and survive.

name: Nuwe: First seeds
summary: Adventure game with a spectacular design and innovative 2D, 3D platform mechanics. Located in a beautiful universe full of incredible creatures and landscapes.
